abstract: Laura Pollan Toledo, former high school Spanish teacher who became one of Cuba’s most public dissidents as she led other wives of political prisoners in protest, dies at age 63.
snippet: Ms. Pollán founded the Ladies in White, who march in protest every Sunday in Havana, after a 2003 government crackdown.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations

lead_paragraph: Ms. Pollán founded the Ladies in White, who march in protest every Sunday in Havana, after a 2003 government crackdown.

headline.main: Laura Pollán Toledo, Who Rallied Wives of Jailed Cuban Dissidents, Dies at 63
headline.print_headline: Laura Pollán Toledo, 63; Rallied Wives of Jailed Cuban Dissidents
headline.seo: Laura Pollán Toledo, Cuban Dissident, Dies at 63
